name: Void Swinger- Directors Cut
description:
(This game was a submission to the GMTK 2021 game jam and was made in 48 hours)

PLOT:

In a not so distant future, the world was consumed by something survivors called "The Void", a brave group of survivors who dared to tread through these parts were nicknamed "Void Swingers", Through many sacrifices the path to the heart of The Void has finally been found.

You play as a Volunteer who, through his amazing Parkour skillset will embark on a quest to rejoin Humanity once again and return the earth to it's former Glory.. 

Good luck!
